title: Provide a Retailer with Access to the Online Ordering Portal
description: A retailer's employee needs an account set up so they can place orders through the self-service online portal.

tasks.description: Receive a request from a retailer to add a new user to their online account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the new user's name and email.

tasks.description: Create a new user account under the retailer's main account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the new user.

tasks.description: Assign the appropriate permissions to the user (e.g., can place orders but not view billing).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets the correct user roles and permissions.

tasks.description: Send a welcome email to the new user with instructions on how to log in and set their password.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new user receives their login instructions.
